title: AU Small Finance Bank Ltd gains for fifth session - Business Standard
content: AU Small Finance Bank Ltd gains for fifth session  Business Standard
description: AU Small Finance Bank Ltd is quoting at Rs 1331.45, up 1.26% on the day as on 12:49 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 7.97% in last one year as compared to a 20.66% gain in NIFTY and a 14.59% gain in the Nifty Bank.
